allow:
Bash(python3 -c "
import json
from pathlib import Path

# Count actual combat training pairs
combat_dir = Path(''datasets/combat_training'')
persona_dir = Path(''datasets/persona_combat_training'')

combat_pairs = 0
persona_pairs = 0

for f in combat_dir.glob(''*.json''):
    try:
        data = json.load(open(f))
        combat_pairs += len(data.get(''training_pairs'', []))
    except: pass

for f in persona_dir.glob(''*.json''):
    try:
        data = json.load(open(f))
        persona_pairs += len(data.get(''training_pairs'', []))
    except: pass

print(f''Combat pairs: {combat_pairs}'')
print(f''Persona pairs: {persona_pairs}'')
print(f''TOTAL HIGH-QUALITY PAIRS: {combat_pairs + persona_pairs}'')
")
